title: What's news in v2.23.6
content:
Features:
  - Layers and folders can have multiple masks
  - Masks can be merged into the main layer
  - Layer panel can be expanded to take up the entire width of the screen
     + Settings > General > Layer panel position > Expanded width

Enhancements:
  - Improved layer merge
  - Added back outline preview for drawing tools with 0% opacity
  - Added support for new files via deep link
  - Setting panels are a bit bigger to make them easier to navigate

Fixes:
  - Various rare crashes
